mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEWS (reservations_id, customer_id, hanok_id, room_id, review_title, review_content, rating, review_date) VALUES (#{reservations_id}, #{customer_id}, #{hanok_id}, #{room_id}, #{review_title}, #{review_content}, #{rating}, NOW());
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM REVIEWS WHERE room_id = #{room_id} ORDER BY review_date DESC;
